title: Ticket #2650: Fix shortcomings of log file locking code
description:
There are some shortcomings in the current file locking code:

  1. If the default lock file path in the code is ever sufficiently increased (e.g., from "/tmp/condorLocks/" to "/tmp/really-long-directory-path-condorLocks/" or something) the code will segfault.

  2. There's a method that contains 50% duplicated code.

  3. There are a number of places that use sprintfs.

  4. The code could generally be cleaned up some (e.g., use strnewp() instead of separate calls to new() and strcpy()).

  5. This is not really a code problem, but LOCAL_DISK_LOCK_DIR is not documented anywhere.
